description: For a pesto that still packs a punch, swap the traditional basil and pine nuts for tired nuts or seeds, carrot leaves, or leftover parsley stalks.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Pimp Up Your Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the garlic, basil, pine nuts, and vinegar in a food processor and whizz until combined.
With the motor running, slowly drizzle the olive oil into the pesto until combined. You may need to stop the machine occasionally to push the mixture down with a spatula.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 1 week.
